New Records: Caden Dana became the youngest pitcher in Angels history to win his major league debut; Lloyd Raley hit his first home run as a Mariner
Key Match Events: The game was decided in the bottom of the 9th inning by a sacrifice fly from Robles scoring Rojas; Mariners scored 2 runs in the 5th inning with Rendon's single
Post-Match Reflections: Caden Dana's debut victory was a pivotal moment for the Angels; Mariners fought back from a 2-1 deficit in the 9th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angel Stadium attendance: 39,370; Game time: 2 hours and 36 minutes; Mariners had 5 hits and 1 home run; Angels had 4 hits and 1 home run
Others: This was Game 3 of the series; Mariners had a 9-5 record; Angels had a 57-80 overall record
